meanings.definition: Live bacteria and yeasts that are good for your health, especially your digestive system.
meanings.sent1: Eating probiotics can help keep your stomach healthy.
meanings.sent2: Many people take probiotics to improve their digestion.
meanings.sent3: The probiotics in yogurt are like tiny helpers for your tummy.
meanings.sent4: Probiotics are like little soldiers fighting for your gut's well-being.
meanings.sent5: Think of probiotics as friendly bugs that support your body's balance.

meanings.definition: A substance that contains live bacteria and yeasts, taken especially in the form of a pill or a liquid, that is intended to improve the health of your digestive system.
meanings.sent1: My doctor recommended probiotics to help with my digestion.
meanings.sent2: Probiotics are available in various forms like capsules and drinks.
meanings.sent3: I always feel like a scientist when I take my daily dose of probiotics.
meanings.sent4: Taking probiotics is like giving your gut a boost of beneficial microbes.
meanings.sent5: The probiotics in my smoothie make it a nutritious treat for my tummy.
